mapper.select: select ct.ctid,weekno,week,start,size, (select courseName from course where course.courseId = oc.courseId)courseName, (select rname from room where room.rid = ct.rid)rname, (select tname from teacher where teacher.tid = oc.tid)tname from course_table ct,open_course oc where ct.oid = oc.oid and cid=#{cid}
